comments.text: We should profile this and see how much time is spent in JS and if there are any performance faults.
comments.raw_text: We should profile this and see how much time is spent in JS and if there are any performance faults.

In Tom's Hardware Guide's June 2013 Grand Prix, Firefox 21 came in first place on Facebook's JSGameBench, handily beating Chrome 27:

http://www.tomshardware.com/reviews/chrome-27-firefox-21-opera-next,3534-8.html
